New Records: Australia set a T20 powerplay world record
Key Match Events: Josh Inglis's century set up a commanding win for Australia
Australia set a T20 powerplay world record
Pre-Game Insights: Australia captain Mitchell Marsh lost the toss and Richie Berrington sent the tourists into bat
Post-Match Reflections: Australia captain Mitchell Marsh said after the win: "A really good game of cricket â€” the way Inglis and Green got us out of trouble was excellent. Josh was just unbelievable in another all-round performance from us."
Miscellaneous Highlights: The final match of the three-match series is in Edinburgh on Saturday
The match was played in foggy conditions which delayed the start by 30 minutes
Others: Josh Inglis used his feet superbly in Edinburgh and scored runs all around the ground as he hit 103 off 49 balls
Six Australian bowlers took at least one wicket as the Scots subsided to 126 all out
